comment.author: 76016463@N00
comment._content: Another one of those from-the-floor trial shots Frank Abarno [1891-1978, (called Arbano in Times story), 22, one of the Italian anarchist bombers who plotted to blow up St. Patrick's Cathedral on March 2, 1915, and Carmine Carbone 18, the maker of the bomb: query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=9A00E6DB1238E633A... news.google.com/newspapers?nid=1915&dat=19150308&...

comment.author: 33593953@N02
comment._content: Thanks for supplying the details and connecting it up to the related photograph and photos taken from a similar angle.  We can add some information to the description when we next update.

comment._content: FreeRangeBob: Here's a little more about the trial, looks like they were convicted, April 2, 1915. query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?
